definition: Jia Qinglin (1940-), member of the Politburo Standing Committee 2002-2012
woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)

sentences.english: Jia welcomed King Gyanendra to the annual conference of the forum.
sentences.chinese: 贾庆林欢迎贾南德拉国王来华出席博鳌亚洲论坛年会。

sentences.english: Badawi agreed with Jia's comments and proposals on bilateral relations.
sentences.chinese: 巴达维赞同贾庆林对两国关系的评价和提出的建议。

sentences.english: CPPCC National Committee Chairman Jia Qinglin delivered a keynote report after the session started at 3 pm.
sentences.chinese: 政协主席贾庆林在会议开始后发表了重要讲话。

sentences.english: Jia QInglin conveyed the greetings of President Hu Jintao to President Fox.
sentences.chinese: 贾庆林转达了胡锦涛主席对福克斯总统的问候。

sentences.english: Jia said that the Chinese and Fijian people enjoy a long history of friendship.
sentences.chinese: 贾庆林说，中斐两国人民的友谊源远流长。

sentences.english: Jia said that since the establishment of diplomatic ties, bilateral relations have been developing smoothly.
sentences.chinese: 贾庆林说，中马建交以来，两国关系发展顺利。

sentences.english: CPPCC Chairman Jia Qinglin will deliver a speech.
sentences.chinese: 全国政协主席贾庆林将发表讲话。

sentences.english: Jia said that the traditional friendship between both countries has withstood the tests of changeable international situations.
sentences.chinese: 贾庆林说，中越传统友谊经历了国际风云变幻的考验。

sentences.english: Jia first conveyed the cordial greetings from Premier Wen Jiabao to Khai.
sentences.chinese: 贾庆林首先转达了温家宝总理对潘文凯的亲切问候。

sentences.english: Jia Qinglin, chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference delivered a speech over the talks.
sentences.chinese: 全国政协主席贾庆林出席座谈会并讲话。

sentences.english: Jia said that Malaysia is China's important partner in ASEAN.
sentences.chinese: 贾庆林说，马来西亚是中国在东盟的重要伙伴。

sentences.english: Jia conveyed the greetings from President Hu Jintao to Luong.
sentences.chinese: 贾庆林转达了胡锦涛主席对陈德良的问候。

sentences.english: On the same day Jia also met with Taito Waqavakatoga, President of the Fijian Senate.
sentences.chinese: 当日，贾庆林还会见了斐济参议长万加瓦卡通加。

sentences.english: Fox asked Jia QInglin to convey his greetings to President Hu Jintao.
sentences.chinese: 福克斯请贾庆林转达他对胡锦涛主席的问候。

sentences.english: Jia Qinglin delivered a brief speech at the Cancun airport.
sentences.chinese: 贾庆林在坎昆机场发表了简短书面讲话。

sentences.english: Top advisor urges broader, deeper cross-Strait ties.
sentences.chinese: 贾庆林呼吁发展更广泛和更深入的两岸关系。

definition: Wu Bangguo (1941-), PRC electrical engineer and politician, polituro member from 2002
Hu Jintao (1942-), General Secretary of the CCP 2002-2012, president of the PRC 2003-2013
Wu Guanzheng (1938-), former CCP Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection
Jiang Zemin (1926-), politician, president of PRC 1993-2003
Hui Liangyu (1944-) PRC Hui national career politician from Guilin, background in economics, politburo member 2002-2012, deputy chair of State Council 2003-2013
Liu Yunshan (1947-), PRC politician, background in journalism in Inner Mongolia, head of the Central Propaganda Department 2002-2012
Wen Jiabao (1942-), Premier of PRC from 2003-2013
Hua Guofeng (1921-2008), leader of Chinese Communist Party after the Cultural Revolution
